metadata.title: Deposition of Dr. Alexander Spears, State of Florida v. American Tobacco Company, Tape 3 [Parts 1-3]
metadata.description: Deposition of Dr. Alexander Spears in the case of the State of Florida v. American Tobacco Company. Spears answers questions about the independence of the Scientific Advisory Board of the Council for Tobacco Research, the extent to which attorneys were involved in scientific research activities, whether cigarette smoking causes disease, and the Kicks for Kids project. Click Here to View Part 1 Click Here to View Part 2 Click Here to View Part 3
